content.question: According to the passage, which of the following is the most likely implication of China’s current economic policies toward African nations?

choices.label: African nations may adopt Communist principles to continue to attract Chinese aid.
Indebted African nations may lose sovereignty to the Chinese government and large banks.
China may become a member of regional African economic organizations such as ECOWAS.
China’s economic growth may become overly dependent on resources from Africa.

content.answer: Indebted African nations may lose sovereignty to the Chinese government and large banks.
